item.title: 卫星制造商 EnduroSat 从谷歌风投等公司获得 1.04 亿美元融资
item.description: EnduroSat 周四表示，它已从包括谷歌风险投资公司（Google Ventures）、卢森堡资本公司（Lux Capital）和欧洲投资委员会（European Investment Council）在内的投资者那里筹集到 1.04 亿美元，这家总部位于保加利亚的公司正在扩大其中小型卫星的生产规模。【原文：EnduroSat said on Thursday it has raised $104 million from investors, including Google Ventures, Lux Capital and the European Investment Council, as the Bulgaria-based company scales up production of its small and midsized satellites.】

item.title: 债券发行活动强劲，标普全球上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 由于强劲的债券发行活动推动了评级业务的增长，S&P Global 周四上调了年度盈利预期，使其股价在收盘前上涨了 2.4%。【原文：S&P Global raised its annual earnings forecasts on Thursday, as robust bond issuance activity drove growth in its ratings business, sending its shares up 2.4% before the bell.】

item.title: 好时上调年度预测，因为购物者会选择价格更高的食品
item.description: 好时（Hershey）周四上调了全年销售额和利润预期，此前公布的季度业绩好于预期，好时将赌注押在对其价格较高的巧克力和零食的强劲需求上。【原文：Hershey on Thursday raised its annual sales and profit forecasts after posting better-than-expected quarterly results, betting on robust demand for its higher-priced chocolates and snacks.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，美国能源部长赖特表示，美国已准备好向中国出售更多石油和天然气
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）表示，如果中国政府减少从俄罗斯购买石油和天然气，美国准备向中国出售更多石油和天然气。【原文：Energy Secretary Chris Wright said the U.S. is prepared to sell more oil and natural gas to China if Beijing reduces purchases from Russia, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国财政部贝森特称美联储的措辞显示他们 "停留在过去
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四对美联储将利率下调四分之一个百分点的决定表示赞赏，但他表示，有评论对美联储今年再次降息表示怀疑，这表明美联储需要进行重大改革。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Thursday applauded the Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point, but said comments casting doubt on another rate cut this year showed the institution needed a major revamp.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Meta 寻求发行至少 250 亿美元债券
item.description: 据彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 公司的债券销售目标是至少 250 亿美元。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is targeting at least $25 billion in a bond sale, Bloomberg news reported on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国汽车业计划建立临时芯片信息平台以缓解供应风险
item.description: 德国汽车工业协会（VDA）周四表示，该协会计划通过中立的第三方建立一个临时信息平台，以帮助制造商和供应商避免可能出现的芯片短缺所带来的负面影响。【原文：Germany's automotive industry association VDA plans to set up a temporary information platform via a neutral third party to help manufacturers and suppliers avoid the negative consequences of a possible chip shortage, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于烟草需求低迷，Altria 预计全年利润不高
item.description: 烟草巨头 Altria 周四预测的年度利润将大大低于市场预期，原因是对其香烟和口服烟替代品（如尼古丁袋）的需求下降。【原文：Tobacco giant Altria forecast annual profit largely below market expectations on Thursday, hurt by lower demand for its cigarettes and oral smoking alternatives such as on! nicotine pouches.】

item.title: 交易量保持强劲，万事达卡季度利润上升
item.description: 万事达卡周四公布的第三季度利润大幅增长，原因是持续的消费支出促进了其网络支付量的增长。【原文：Mastercard reported a jump in third-quarter profit on Thursday, as sustained consumer spending boosted payment volumes on its networks.】

item.title: 独家报道：道富银行将美国基金部门撤出气候组织
item.description: 全球第三大资产管理公司国泰君安（State Street）表示，尽管该行业主要的全球气候联盟努力通过放宽规则来留住成员，但国泰君安正在将其大部分业务撤出该联盟。【原文：State Street , the world's third-biggest asset manager, said it is pulling the bulk of its operations out of the sector's main global climate coalition despite the group's efforts to retain members by relaxing its rules.】

item.title: Aptiv 因汽车制造商对电气和软件系统的需求而上调年度利润预期
item.description: Aptiv 公司周四上调了全年盈利预期，原因是全球汽车行业对其电气和软件系统的需求持续增长。【原文：Aptiv raised its full-year profit forecast on Thursday, banking on sustained demand for its electrical and software systems from the global auto industry.】

item.title: 针对特朗普，日本汽车制造商可能进口部分美国制造的汽车
item.description: 日本汽车制造商正在考虑将部分美国制造的汽车进口到日本--这一举措既昂贵又不切实际，因为东京正试图就其与美国的巨额贸易顺差安抚唐纳德-特朗普总统。【原文：Japanese automakers are considering importing some of their U.S.-built cars to Japan - a costly and impractical move that comes as Tokyo tries to placate President Donald Trump over its vast trade surplus with the United States.】

item.title: 美国财政部部长称中国已批准 TikTok 转让交易
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四表示，中国已经批准了短视频应用 TikTok 的转让协议，并补充说他预计该协议将在未来几周或几个月内得到推进，但没有透露其他细节。【原文：China has approved the transfer agreement for the short video app TikTok, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Thursday, adding that he expects it to move forward in coming weeks and months but giving no other details.】

item.title: 印度 Reliance Jio 用户可免费使用谷歌 Gemini AI Pro 18 个月
item.description: 谷歌和 Reliance Jio 周四表示，谷歌的 Gemini AI Pro 订阅计划将免费提供给印度的 Reliance Jio 用户，为期 18 个月。【原文：Google's Gemini AI Pro subscription plan will be offered for free to Reliance Jio users in India for 18 months, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 病毒游戏吸引大量消费，Roblox 提高年度预订预期
item.description: Roblox 周四今年第三次上调了年度预订预期，原因是 "偷个脑瓜 "等病毒式游戏的游戏内支出强劲，也帮助其日均活跃用户数突破了 1.5 亿。【原文：Roblox on Thursday raised its annual bookings forecast for the third time this year on the back of strong in-game spending on viral titles such as "Steal a Brainrot" that also helped it surpass 150 million daily active users.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所母公司 ICE 第三季度利润因交易活动强劲而增长
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontental Exchange）周四公布第三季度利润增长，主要得益于强劲的交易活动。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by strong trading activity.】

item.title: Tubi 带动广告销售，福克斯季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受免费流媒体平台 Tubi 广告销售强劲的推动，福克斯公司周四公布的季度营收超出预期。【原文：Fox Corp beat estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, boosted by strong advertising sales at its free streaming platform Tubi.】

item.title: 贝森特：特朗普与习近平会晤后美国将停止实体限制一年
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四表示，美国将颁布为期一年的实体清单限制暂停令，使中国企业更难利用关联公司购买禁用技术。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Thursday said that the U.S. would enact a one-year suspension of Entity List restrictions that make it harder for Chinese firms to use affiliates to buy off-limits technology.】

item.title: 早间竞标：对 "已成定局 "的犹豫不决
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: AIG 和 Onex 联手以 70 亿美元收购专业保险公司 Convex
item.description: 资产管理公司 Onex 周四宣布与保险公司 AIG 合作，以 70 亿美元的价格收购私营专业保险公司 Convex Group。【原文：Asset manager Onex on Thursday announced it has teamed up with insurer AIG to buy privately held specialty insurer Convex Group in a $7 billion deal.】

item.title: 日产预计年度运营亏损 18 亿美元，担心供应链风险
item.description: 日产汽车（Nissan Motor）周四表示，由于美国关税的影响，该公司预计将出现2,750亿日元（合18.2亿美元）的年度运营亏损，并警告说供应链风险将成为下半财年最大的不利因素。【原文：Nissan Motor said on Thursday it expects to book a 275 billion yen ($1.82 billion) in annual operating losses due to the impact of U.S. tariffs and warned that supply chain risks would be the biggest headwind in its fiscal second half.】

item.title: 由于 Opdivo 销售强劲，百时美施贵宝季度收入超出预期
item.description: 布里斯托尔-迈尔斯-施贵宝公司（Bristol Myers Squibb）周四公布的第三季度收入超过了华尔街的预期，原因是其癌症免疫疗法和血液稀释剂 Eliquis 的强劲增长帮助该制药商克服了几种老药的仿制药竞争带来的冲击。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Thursday, as strong growth of its cancer immunotherapy and blood thinner Eliquis helped the drugmaker overcome a hit from generic competition for several older drugs.】

item.title: 侏罗纪世界》和主题公园的蓬勃发展使康卡斯特第三季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast）周四公布的季度业绩超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于其主题公园越来越受欢迎，以及最新电影《侏罗纪世界》（Jurassic World）带来的强劲票房回报。【原文：Comcast surpassed Wall Street expectations for quarterly results on Thursday, thanks to the growing popularity of its theme parks and strong box office returns from its latest "Jurassic World" movie.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局对58.36万辆存在安全问题的本田汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）对约58.36万辆本田汽车的后排安全带警告和安全气囊意外展开的潜在缺陷分别展开了调查。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) has launched separate investigations into about 583,600 Honda vehicles over potential defects involving rear seatbelt warnings and inadvertent airbag deployments.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动数据中心需求增长，施耐德电气内生增长超出预期
item.description: 周四，施耐德电气的有机收入增长超过了季度预期，这主要得益于人工智能数据中心需求的激增，这家法国工业集团正在巩固其作为该行业主要供应商的地位。【原文：Schneider Electric's organic revenue growth beat quarterly estimates on Thursday, propelled by surging demand for data centres that power artificial intelligence, as the French industrial group cements its role as a key supplier for the sector.】

item.title: 礼来上调全年业绩预期，减肥药需求推动第三季度业绩增长
item.description: 礼来公司周四上调了全年利润和收入预期，原因是其广受欢迎的减肥药和糖尿病药物Zepbound和Mounjaro的强劲需求帮助其第三季度盈利超过预期。【原文：Eli Lilly raised its full-year profit and revenue forecast on Thursday as strong appetite for its widely popular weight-loss and diabetes drugs Zepbound and Mounjaro helped it beat third-quarter earnings estimates.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称有信心特朗普与习近平进行良好会谈
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋周四表示，他相信美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国领导人习近平当天早些时候在韩国会晤期间进行了良好的对话。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday he was confident that U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping had a good conversation during a meeting in South Korea earlier in the day.】

item.title: 金佰利公司季度销售额超出预期，原因是家用主食需求保持稳定
item.description: 周四，Huggies 纸尿裤制造商金佰利-克拉克公司的第三季度销售额超过了分析师的预期，原因是疲于通胀的消费者倾向于购买其经济实惠的主食。【原文：Huggies diaper maker Kimberly-Clark topped analysts' estimates for third-quarter sales on Thursday, as inflation-weary consumers gravitated toward its affordable staples.】

item.title: 由于炼油利润率提高，HF Sinclair 第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 炼油商 HF Sinclair 周四公布的第三季度调整后利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于炼油利润率的提高和中游业务的强劲表现，股价在盘前交易中上涨了 1%。【原文：Refiner HF Sinclair beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter adjusted profit on Thursday, helped by improvement in refining margins and strength in its midstream segment, sending shares up 1% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 默克第三季度销售额增长，原因是 Keytruda 的增长抵消了加德西的下降
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co）周四公布第三季度收入增长，原因是其癌症治疗大片 Keytruda 的增长抵消了人乳头瘤病毒疫苗加卫苗（Gardasil）在中国销售额的下降。【原文：Merck & Co on Thursday posted higher third quarter revenue as growth from its blockbuster cancer drug Keytruda offset falling sales from human papillomavirus vaccine Gardasil in China.】
